00052 static ssize_t
00053 mdd_atime_diff_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00054                          size_t count, loff_t *off)
00055 {
00056         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00057         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00058         char kernbuf[20], *end;
00059         unsigned long diff = 0;
00060 
00061         if (count > (sizeof(kernbuf) - 1))
00062                 return -EINVAL;
00063 
00064         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
00065                 return -EFAULT;
00066 
00067         kernbuf[count] = '\0';
00068 
00069         diff = simple_strtoul(kernbuf, &end, 0);
00070         if (kernbuf == end)
00071                 return -EINVAL;
00072 
00073         mdd->mdd_atime_diff = diff;
00074         return count;
00075 }
00076 
00077 static int mdd_atime_diff_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00078 {
00079         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00080 
00081         seq_printf(m, "%lu\n", mdd->mdd_atime_diff);
00082         return 0;
00083 }
00084 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdd_atime_diff);
00085 
00086 /**** changelogs ****/
00087 static int mdd_changelog_mask_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00088 {
00089         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00090         int i = 0;
00091 
00092         while (i < CL_LAST) {
00093                 if (mdd->mdd_cl.mc_mask & (1 << i))
00094                         seq_printf(m, "%s ", changelog_type2str(i));
00095                 i++;
00096         }
00097         return 0;
00098 }
00099 
00100 static ssize_t
00101 mdd_changelog_mask_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00102                              size_t count, loff_t *off)
00103 {
00104         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00105         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00106         char *kernbuf;
00107         int rc;
00108         ENTRY;
00109 
00110         if (count >= PAGE_CACHE_SIZE)
00111                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00112         OBD_ALLOC(kernbuf, PAGE_CACHE_SIZE);
00113         if (kernbuf == NULL)
00114                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00115         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
00116                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00117         kernbuf[count] = 0;
00118 
00119         rc = cfs_str2mask(kernbuf, changelog_type2str, &mdd->mdd_cl.mc_mask,
00120                           CHANGELOG_MINMASK, CHANGELOG_ALLMASK);
00121         if (rc == 0)
00122                 rc = count;
00123 out:
00124         OBD_FREE(kernbuf, PAGE_CACHE_SIZE);
00125         return rc;
00126 }
00127 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdd_changelog_mask);
00128 
00129 static int lprocfs_changelog_users_cb(const struct lu_env *env,
00130                                       struct llog_handle *llh,
00131                                       struct llog_rec_hdr *hdr, void *data)
00132 {
00133         struct llog_changelog_user_rec *rec;
00134         struct seq_file *m = data;
00135 
00136         LASSERT(llh->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_PLAIN);
00137 
00138         rec = (struct llog_changelog_user_rec *)hdr;
00139 
00140         seq_printf(m, CHANGELOG_USER_PREFIX"%-3d "LPU64"\n",
00141                    rec->cur_id, rec->cur_endrec);
00142         return 0;
00143 }
00144 
00145 static int mdd_changelog_users_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00146 {
00147         struct lu_env            env;
00148         struct mdd_device       *mdd = m->private;
00149         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00150         __u64                    cur;
00151         int                      rc;
00152 
00153         ctxt = llog_get_context(mdd2obd_dev(mdd),
00154                                 LLOG_CHANGELOG_USER_ORIG_CTXT);
00155         if (ctxt == NULL)
00156                 return -ENXIO;
00157         LASSERT(ctxt->loc_handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_CAT);
00158 
00159         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_LOCAL);
00160         if (rc) {
00161                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00162                 return rc;
00163         }
00164 
00165         spin_lock(&mdd->mdd_cl.mc_lock);
00166         cur = mdd->mdd_cl.mc_index;
00167         spin_unlock(&mdd->mdd_cl.mc_lock);
00168 
00169         seq_printf(m, "current index: "LPU64"\n", cur);
00170         seq_printf(m, "%-5s %s\n", "ID", "index");
00171 
00172         llog_cat_process(&env, ctxt->loc_handle, lprocfs_changelog_users_cb,
00173                          m, 0, 0);
00174 
00175         lu_env_fini(&env);
00176         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00177         return 0;
00178 }
00179 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(mdd_changelog_users);
00180 
00181 static int mdd_changelog_size_ctxt(const struct lu_env *env,
00182                                    struct mdd_device *mdd,
00183                                    int index, __u64 *val)
00184 {
00185         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00186 
00187         ctxt = llog_get_context(mdd2obd_dev(mdd),
00188                                 index);
00189         if (ctxt == NULL)
00190                 return -ENXIO;
00191 
00192         if (!(ctxt->loc_handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_CAT)) {
00193                 CERROR("%s: ChangeLog has wrong flags: rc = %d\n",
00194                        ctxt->loc_obd->obd_name, -EINVAL);
00195                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00196                 return -EINVAL;
00197         }
00198 
00199         *val += llog_cat_size(env, ctxt->loc_handle);
00200 
00201         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00202 
00203         return 0;
00204 }
00205 
00206 static int mdd_changelog_size_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00207 {
00208         struct lu_env            env;
00209         struct mdd_device       *mdd = m->private;
00210         __u64                    tmp = 0;
00211         int                      rc;
00212 
00213         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_LOCAL);
00214         if (rc)
00215                 return rc;
00216 
00217         rc = mdd_changelog_size_ctxt(&env, mdd, LLOG_CHANGELOG_ORIG_CTXT, &tmp);
00218         if (rc) {
00219                 lu_env_fini(&env);
00220                 return rc;
00221         }
00222 
00223         rc = mdd_changelog_size_ctxt(&env, mdd, LLOG_CHANGELOG_USER_ORIG_CTXT,
00224                                      &tmp);
00225 
00226         seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", tmp);
00227         lu_env_fini(&env);
00228         return rc;
00229 }
00230 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(mdd_changelog_size);

00232 static int mdd_sync_perm_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00233 {
00234         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00235 
00236         LASSERT(mdd != NULL);
00237         seq_printf(m, "%d\n", mdd->mdd_sync_permission);
00238         return 0;
00239 }
00240 
00241 static ssize_t
00242 mdd_sync_perm_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00243                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00244 {
00245         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00246         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00247         int rc;
00248         __s64 val;
00249 
00250         LASSERT(mdd != NULL);
00251         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00252         if (rc)
00253                 return rc;
00254 
00255         mdd->mdd_sync_permission = !!val;
00256 
00257         return count;
00258 }
00259 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdd_sync_perm);

00261 static int mdd_lfsck_speed_limit_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00262 {
00263         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00264 
00265         LASSERT(mdd != NULL);
00266         return lfsck_get_speed(m, mdd->mdd_bottom);
00267 }
00268 
00269 static ssize_t
00270 mdd_lfsck_speed_limit_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00271                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00272 {
00273         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00274         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00275         __s64 val;
00276         int rc;
00277 
00278         LASSERT(mdd != NULL);
00279         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00280         if (rc != 0)
00281                 return rc;
00282         if (val < 0 || val > INT_MAX)
00283                 return -ERANGE;
00284 
00285         rc = lfsck_set_speed(mdd->mdd_bottom, val);
00286         return rc != 0 ? rc : count;
00287 }
00288 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdd_lfsck_speed_limit);
00289

00292         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00293 
00294         LASSERT(mdd != NULL);
00295         return lfsck_get_windows(m, mdd->mdd_bottom);
00296 }

00298 static ssize_t
00299 mdd_lfsck_async_windows_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00300                                   size_t count, loff_t *off)
00301 {
00302         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00303         struct mdd_device *mdd = m->private;
00304         __s64              val;
00305         int                rc;
00306 
00307         LASSERT(mdd != NULL);
00308         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00309         if (rc)
00310                 return rc;
00311         if (val < 0 || val > INT_MAX)
00312                 return -ERANGE;
00313 
00314         rc = lfsck_set_windows(mdd->mdd_bottom, val);
00315 
00316         return rc != 0 ? rc : count;
00317 }
00318 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdd_lfsck_async_windows);

00340 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_mdd_obd_vars[] = {
00341         { .name =       "atime_diff",
00342           .fops =       &mdd_atime_diff_fops            },
00343         { .name =       "changelog_mask",
00344           .fops =       &mdd_changelog_mask_fops        },
00345         { .name =       "changelog_users",
00346           .fops =       &mdd_changelog_users_fops       },
00347         { .name =       "changelog_size",
00348           .fops =       &mdd_changelog_size_fops        },
00349         { .name =       "sync_permission",
00350           .fops =       &mdd_sync_perm_fops             },
00351         { .name =       "lfsck_speed_limit",
00352           .fops =       &mdd_lfsck_speed_limit_fops     },
00353         { .name =       "lfsck_async_windows",
00354           .fops =       &mdd_lfsck_async_windows_fops   },
00355         { .name =       "lfsck_namespace",
00356           .fops =       &mdd_lfsck_namespace_fops       },
00357         { .name =       "lfsck_layout",
00358           .fops =       &mdd_lfsck_layout_fops          },
00359         { NULL }
00360 };
00361 
00362 int mdd_procfs_init(struct mdd_device *mdd, const char *name)
00363 {
00364         struct obd_device *obd = mdd2obd_dev(mdd);
00365         struct obd_type   *type;
00366         int                rc;
00367         ENTRY;
00368 
00369         /* at the moment there is no linkage between lu_type
00370          * and obd_type, so we lookup obd_type this way */
00371         type = class_search_type(LUSTRE_MDD_NAME);
00372 
00373         LASSERT(name != NULL);
00374         LASSERT(type != NULL);
00375         LASSERT(obd  != NULL);
00376 
00377         /* Find the type procroot and add the proc entry for this device */
00378         obd->obd_vars = lprocfs_mdd_obd_vars;
00379         mdd->mdd_proc_entry = lprocfs_register(name, type->typ_procroot,
00380                                                obd->obd_vars, mdd);
00381         if (IS_ERR(mdd->mdd_proc_entry)) {
00382                 rc = PTR_ERR(mdd->mdd_proc_entry);
00383                 CERROR("Error %d setting up lprocfs for %s\n",
00384                        rc, name);
00385                 mdd->mdd_proc_entry = NULL;
00386                 GOTO(out, rc);
00387         }
00388         rc = 0;
00389         EXIT;
00390 out:
00391         if (rc)
00392                 mdd_procfs_fini(mdd);
00393         return rc;
00394 }
00395 
00396 void mdd_procfs_fini(struct mdd_device *mdd)
00397 {
00398         if (mdd->mdd_proc_entry)
00399                 lprocfs_remove(&mdd->mdd_proc_entry);
00400 }
